original_text: I used gold and silver to make you beautiful. I gave you expensive clothes that were made of linen and other pretty cloth. I gave you good food to eat, flour, honey and olive oil. You became a very beautiful woman. You even became a queen.
korean_text: 이와 같이 네가 금, 은으로 장식하고 가는 베와 모시와 수 놓은 것을 입으며 또 고운 밀가루와 꿀과 기름을 먹음으로 극히 곱고 형통하여 왕후의 지위에 올랐느니라

sentences.original_text: I used gold and silver to make you beautiful.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 금과 은으로 당신을 아름답게 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: that were made of linen and other pretty cloth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 옷은 아마와 다른 예쁜 천으로 만들어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: I gave you good food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신에게 먹을 좋은 음식을 주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: You became a very beautiful woman.
